text: The men's 100 metres event at the 1999 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Göteborg, Sweden, at Ullevi on 29 and 30 July 1999. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Christoforos Choidis ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Marcin Nowak ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Christian Malcolm ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 30 July Wind: 2.8m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
